Run I Top Studies
Run I Top Studies

• Observed in 1995 in first ~70 pb-1 of Run I data. • Final Run I top analyses based on ~110 pb-1. – Production cross sections in many channels – Mass: 174.3  5.1 GeV (CDF/DØ combined) – Event kinematics – W helicity, limits on single top production..
